{"id":1292056259,"question_id":15,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1718690650,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1597 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1292056259/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"293.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<vector<int>>x;\n        set<vector<int>>x1;\n        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());\n\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size()-2;i++){\n            int lo=i+1;\n            int hi=nums.size()-1;\n            while(lo<hi){\n                if(nums[lo]+nums[hi]+nums[i]==0){\n                    x1.insert({nums[i],nums[lo],nums[hi]});\n                    lo++;hi--;\n                }\n                else if(nums[lo]+nums[hi]+nums[i]<0){\n                    lo++;\n                }\n                else{\n                    hi--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        for(auto kl:x1){\n            x.push_back(kl);\n        }\n        return x;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
